name: Once Upon A Time (itch) (Isabellll, Sagy)
description:
You have been deceived and banished by the witch. Now the witch is taking the princess hostage and building her mushroom empire. It's up to you and...... an overweight fairy(?) to stop the witch and save the princess. Defeat your enemies with a magic stick and overcome different obstacles. 

Credits:  

Çağatay Demir - Programming Art

Isabel Bolşen - Game Design

Osman Taşkın - Audio

Toprak Rüzgar Ünver - Game Design & Narrative

Koray Şenses - Programming
